title: Champ select disconnecting me, cant join game.
body: Today I have had 2 games in a row when banning the client is sitll active however the ban timer hits 0 and just sits there until it says reconnect or exit game, I have restarted PC and I am connected to interet, verified by watching stream at the same time.... is this just me? if so what should I try next?

replies.body:
Whenever you transition from the game lobby to the champion loading screen your pc has to bridge a new connection with our game servers. It sounds like for whatever reason, that connection is becoming unstable and then disconnecting you. I'd suggest going through each step in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to rule out any possibilities there first.

Hit me up and let me know how that works!
